Description:
Detects changing the PowerShell script execution policy to a potentially insecure level using the "Set-ExecutionPolicy" cmdlet.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level - PowerShell
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (((scriptblocktext like '%unrestricted%' or scriptblocktext like '%bypass%') and scriptblocktext like '%set-executionpolicy%') and  not (scriptblocktext like '%(new-object system.net.webclient).downloadstring('https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1')%' or scriptblocktext like '%(new-object system.net.webclient).downloadstring('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1')%'))
